table.name: vtiger_bhscallbacklist
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscallbacklist` ( `bhscallbacklistid` int(19) NOT NULL, `bhscallbacklist_name` varchar(50) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscallbacklistid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_bhscallbacklistcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_bhscallbacklistcf` ( `bhscallbacklistid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`bhscallbacklistid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
